subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The loss placed the Mets 11 1/2 games behind the Atlanta Braves in the National League wild-card race, creating a feeling that it’s the beginning of the end for this season.
snippet: The loss placed the Mets 11 1/2 games behind the Atlanta Braves in the National League wild-card race, creating a feeling that it’s the beginning of the end for this season.
